title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not displayed.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the user should still be able to go and define a group by displaying the group dialog.
SR: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. To reproduce this issue, add a table report item without setting the dataset, then try to create a new table group.
